name: The Rise of the Dough
summary:
Once upon a time in a culinary land, a passionate Chef Heiny aspired to craft the finest bread imaginable.

Despite earnest attempts, his initial endeavors proved fruitless, leading him to discard the dough in frustration.

However, the following day brought an unexpected turn of events, and everything took a chaotic twist when Doug Heiny was born.

You must stop Doug H. from spreading across the world!
